title: 我想把人民币兑换成德国马克

conversations.english: I would like to exchange Chinese money into German currency please.
conversations.chinese: 我想把人民币兑换成德国马克。
conversations.reply_english: Certainly. How much will you be exchanging today?

title: 我想查下我卡里还有多少余额

conversations.english: Good afternoon, Miss. What can I do for you?
conversations.chinese: 小姐，早上好。有什么我可以帮你的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Could you tell me my account balance? My account number is...
conversations.reply_chinese: 你可以告诉我我的账户还有多少余额吗？我的账号是…

title: 我想取完钱消掉银行账号

conversations.english: I would like to withdraw my money and close my account please.
conversations.chinese: 我想把钱都取出来，然后消户。

title: 在美国银行办理银行转账

conversations.english: Good morning ,welcome to Bank of the USA. How may I help you today?
conversations.chinese: 早晨好，欢迎来到美国银行，我能为你做点什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi,I need to transfer some money to another account. It’s urgent.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我需要将钱转到另一个账号，很紧急。

title: 我想给马诺丽亚公司汇款

conversations.english: Good morning, may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，请问有什么可以帮您？
conversations.reply_english: Hello, I want to remit one thousand Yuan to Magnolia Company.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我想给马诺丽亚公司汇一千元钱。

conversations.english: Good morning, sir. Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，先生。我能帮您点什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I want to deposit 1000 Yuan in my bank account.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想在银行账户中存1000元钱。

title: 我想开个银行存款帐户

conversations.english: Hello, I'd like to open an account.
conversations.reply_english: Which account would you like to open?
